rows.label: xs32160100_MSG0010
rows.name: Hey there! How's it poppin'?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32160100_MSG0020
rows.name: Terrible, right? How about you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32160100_MSG0030
rows.name: Better than you, meaning terrific![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32160100_MSG0040
rows.name: That's great, isn't it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32160100_MSG0050
rows.name:
Look at him.
He's really found his footing here, hasn't he?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32160100_MSG0060
rows.name:
Once you really get to know him,
most get on with him like a house on fire.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32160100_MSG0080
rows.name: Hey, how's it poppin'?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32160100_MSG0090
rows.name: Tatsu terrible, clearly![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32160100_MSG0100
rows.name: And how is friend Al?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32160100_MSG0110
rows.name: Even worse than you, I bet.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32160100_MSG0120
rows.name: But that not the correct follow-up![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32160100_MSG0130
rows.name: I like to mix it up, keep you on your toes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32160100_MSG0140
rows.name: Al cannot flip script![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32160100_MSG0150
rows.name: Elma...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32160100_MSG0160
rows.name: This vegetable come with a volume knob?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32160100_MSG0170
rows.name: Leave it. You had some news?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32160100_MSG0180
rows.name: Well.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32160100_MSG0190
rows.name: I heard the Ares was recreated on your planet,[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32160100_MSG0195
rows.name: but how much do you actually know about it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32160100_MSG0200
rows.name:
You're correct about it being recreated.
Here's the truth:[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32160100_MSG0210
rows.name:
We excavated an ultra-ancient frame,
and fitted it with auxiliary power and plating.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32160100_MSG0220
rows.name: It might be more precise to say we jury-rigged it to run.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32160100_MSG0230
rows.name:
So, you've got nothing to say regarding
the cores, then, I take it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32160100_MSG0240
rows.name:
If I did, don't you think I would've told you
when I first got to Earth?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32160100_MSG0250
rows.name: Yeah, you got me there.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32160100_MSG0260
rows.name: Vexing, isn't it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32160100_MSG0270
rows.name: The Ares's cores...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32160100_MSG0280
rows.name: I learned they're based on a device that existed eons ago.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32160100_MSG0290
rows.name: A device?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32160100_MSG0300
rows.name:
A space-time-bender.
Moves things into different universes and all that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32160100_MSG0310
rows.name: A meta-doohickey.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32160100_MSG0320
rows.name: It's a common trope in the old movies, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32160100_MSG0330
rows.name: Yeah, except real...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32160100_MSG0340
rows.name:
The energy that the Ares could deploy
thanks to the cores was in a league of its own.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32160100_MSG0350
rows.name: According to simulations, you put the pedal to the metal,[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32160100_MSG0360
rows.name: space bends like a straw.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32160100_MSG0370
rows.name: I see...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32160100_MSG0380
rows.name: If that's true...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32160100_MSG0390
rows.name: what chance do we have of beating Void...?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32160100_JNK0010
rows.name: Pressure

rows.label: xs32160100_SEL0010
rows.name: Urge to take the initiative and strike now.

rows.label: xs32160100_MSG0400
rows.name: Calm down, Rook. We're still okay.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32160100_MSG0410
rows.name: Right.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32160100_MSG0420
rows.name:
The fact is, he took the time to come and taunt us...
It means he's still getting ready.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32160100_JNK0020
rows.name: Allay

rows.label: xs32160100_SEL0020
rows.name: Declare that time is still on your side.

rows.label: xs32160100_MSG0430
rows.name: How do you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32160100_MSG0440
rows.name:
The fact is, he took the time to come and taunt us...
It means he's still getting ready.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32160100_MSG0450
rows.name: Well, even supposing he's through the prep phase...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32160100_MSG0455
rows.name: he can't just rocket off.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32160100_MSG0460
rows.name: What do you mean?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32160100_MSG0470
rows.name: For all his rambling and raving, if the cores were enough,[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32160100_MSG0480
rows.name:
he could've left by now—brought the world into concord,
or whatever his tagline was.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32160100_MSG0490
rows.name: But...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32160100_MSG0500
rows.name: cores alone won't cut it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32160100_MSG0510
rows.name: We figured it out while analyzing the Skell.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32160100_MSG0520
rows.name:
When I was transported inside the Rift
along with the Ares,[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32160100_MSG0530
rows.name:
machine and mind got melded together.
We became inseparable.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32160100_MSG0540
rows.name: I won't pretend to understand,[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32160100_MSG0550
rows.name:
but it wouldn't have been possible for a living
human to hold onto their self there otherwise.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32160100_MSG0560
rows.name: So,[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32160100_MSG0570
rows.name: without me and the Ares,[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32160100_MSG0575
rows.name: the cores won't be able to deploy their full power.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32160100_MSG0580
rows.name: Melded with the Ares... I think I get it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32160100_MSG0590
rows.name: Not in the physical sense of being one thing,[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32160100_MSG0600
rows.name: but like, like an engine running under the hood...?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32160100_MSG0620
rows.name: Damn, you're sharp, Lin.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32160100_MSG0630
rows.name: But the analysis didn't stop there.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32160100_MSG0635
rows.name: Better hold onto your seats.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32160100_MSG0640
rows.name: While inside the Rift,[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32160100_MSG0650
rows.name: I saw where the rivers of consciousness converge.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32160100_MSG0660
rows.name: Something like the crossroads between universes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32160100_MSG0670
rows.name: Even if we get the Ares and cores running,[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32160100_MSG0680
rows.name: if we can't sync ourselves to that,[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32160100_MSG0685
rows.name: we won't be going anywhere.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32160100_MSG0690
rows.name: Annoyingly.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32160100_MSG0700
rows.name: Is it a question of timing, then?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32160100_MSG0710
rows.name: Put simply, yes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32160100_MSG0720
rows.name: And...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32160100_MSG0730
rows.name:
here's another nugget spun off from the Ares's
analysis of the Rift.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32160100_MSG0740
rows.name:
The streams of consciousness converging
on that universal nexus...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32160100_MSG0750
rows.name: Structurally, they're extremely similar to the Lifehold Core.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32160100_MSG0760
rows.name: They're what?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32160100_MSG0780
rows.name: Remember what we were talking about before?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32160100_MSG0790
rows.name:
How Void projecting his mind into the Vita is a lot
like the way humans survive inside mims?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32160100_MSG0800
rows.name: Even with the Lifehold trashed,[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32160100_MSG0810
rows.name: your consciousness is still being stored somewhere.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32160100_MSG0820
rows.name: Not by technology...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32160100_MSG0830
rows.name: but by some much larger universal mechanism.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32160100_MSG0840
rows.name: But that's crazy...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32160100_MSG0850
rows.name: This "universal mechanism"—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32160100_MSG0860
rows.name: what is it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32160100_MSG0870
rows.name: Dunno...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32160100_MSG0880
rows.name: It's just that, when I was there, I felt it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32160100_MSG0890
rows.name: You guys.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32160100_MSG0900
rows.name: People's lives.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32160100_MSG0910
rows.name:
It was strange—like I was enveloped by
this constant "something."[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32160100_MSG0920
rows.name: And the Ares can tap into that...?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32160100_MSG0930
rows.name: This, like, gathering place of minds...?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32160100_MSG0940
rows.name: More like "souls," even...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32160100_MSG0950
rows.name: Call it what you like.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32160100_MSG0960
rows.name: If we make it out of this universe alive,[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32160100_MSG0970
rows.name: you'll get to experience it yourselves.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32160100_MSG0980
rows.name: Anyhow,[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32160100_MSG0990
rows.name: in order to pull off our great escape,[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32160100_MSG0995
rows.name: we'll need those six cores,[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32160100_MSG1000
rows.name: we'll need me, the Ares, and some miraculous timing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32160100_MSG1010
rows.name: That's how we sync to the nexus. Or die trying.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32160100_MSG1020
rows.name: In matter of fact...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32160100_MSG1030
rows.name: Void's no fool. He'll have cottoned on by now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32160100_MSG1040
rows.name: But if that's the case,[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32160100_MSG1050
rows.name: why hasn't he attacked NLA yet?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32160100_MSG1060
rows.name: If he did, he might end up killing Al.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32160100_MSG1070
rows.name: He won't want to risk destroying the Ares either.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32160100_MSG1080
rows.name: Still...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32160100_MSG1090
rows.name:
Once he gets his ducks in a row,
I expect he probably will try something.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32160100_MSG1100
rows.name: Okay. So what's our game plan?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32160100_MSG1120
rows.name: What do you think, Rook?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32160100_MSG1130
rows.name: You better knock this out one of the park.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32160100_JNK0030
rows.name: Compel

rows.label: xs32160100_SEL0030
rows.name: Insist on a preemptive strike.

rows.label: xs32160100_MSG1140
rows.name: ...Five-star answer.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32160100_MSG1150
rows.name: I knew I saw something in you...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32160100_MSG1160
rows.name: Of me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32160100_JNK0040
rows.name: Talk Big

rows.label: xs32160100_SEL0040
rows.name:
Tell Al you'll be done and back
in time for lunch.

rows.label: xs32160100_MSG1170
rows.name: Aha ha ha![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32160100_MSG1180
rows.name: Home run![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32160100_MSG1190
rows.name: I'll hold you to it, bud.[ST:wait ]
